com.inmobi.androidsdk
Class IMAdView

java.lang.Object
  RelativeLayout
      com.inmobi.androidsdk.IMAdView

public final class IMAdView
extends RelativeLayout

IMAdView is used to load and render ads. The mandatory parameters for loading ads are App ID and Ad Slot size. This class can be instantiated either in the layout XML or in the program via constructor. If it is being instantiated from the XML, make sure you include appId="" and adSlot="" attributes.

loadNewAd

public void loadNewAd()
Load a new ad into the IMAdView. Ad will not be loaded if the previous ad is currently being loaded or if the User Click event is being processed. A minimum of 20 seconds must be maintained between consequent success requests, otherwise onAdRequestFailed method would be called on IMAdListener with ErrorCode.INVALID_REQUEST.

loadNewAd

public void loadNewAd(IMAdRequest imAdRequest)
Load a new ad into the IMAdView. Ad will not be loaded if the previous ad is currently being loaded or if the User Click event is being processed. A minimum of 20 seconds must be maintained between consequent success requests, otherwise onAdRequestFailed method would be called on IMAdListener with ErrorCode.INVALID_REQUEST.

Parameters:
imAdRequest - The IMAdRequest instance with relevant values set.

setAdBackgroundColor

public void setAdBackgroundColor(java.lang.String color)
Set the background color for the "Text" ads. This method will not have any effect on the "Banner" or "Rich Media" ads.

Parameters:
color - the color value in the format #rgb or #rrggbb

setAdBackgroundGradientColor

public void setAdBackgroundGradientColor(java.lang.String topColor,
                                         java.lang.String bottomColor)
Set the background gradient color for the "Text" ads. This method will not have any effect on the "Banner" or "Rich Media" ads.

Parameters:
topColor - The topColor value in the format #rgb or #rrggbb.
bottomColor - The bottomColor value in the format #rgb or #rrggbb.

setAdTextColor

public void setAdTextColor(java.lang.String color)
Set the text color for the "Text" ads. This method will not have any effect on the "Banner" or "Rich Media" ads.

Parameters:
color - The color value in the format #rgb or #rrggbb.

setRefreshInterval

public void setRefreshInterval(int refreshInterval)
Starts or stops the auto refresh of ads. By default, the refresh interval is set to 20 seconds. Setting a new valid refresh interval value will start the auto refresh of ads if it is not already started. Use IMADView.REFRESH_INTERVAL_OFF in the parameter to switch off the auto refresh. When auto refresh turned off, use loadNewAd() method to manually load new ads. The SDK will not refresh ads if the screen is in the background or if the phone is locked.

Parameters:
refreshInterval - The refreshInterval value, which cannot be less than 20 seconds.

setAnimationType

public void setAnimationType(IMAdView.AnimationType animationType)
Set the animation between the ad swaps.

Parameters:
animationType - The animation type.
